success.description: Search and summarize columns based on unit properties or geographic location

parameters.int_id: integer, a chronostratigraphic time interval ID from /defs/intervals
parameters.age: numerical age in millions of years before present
parameters.age_top: numerical age (Ma) - must be used with age_bottom and be less than age_bottom
parameters.age_bottom: numerical age (Ma) - must be used with age_top and be greater than age_top
parameters.lith_id: integer, ID of a lithology from /defs/lithologies
parameters.lith: string, specific lithology name (e.g., shale, sandstone)
parameters.lith_type: string, groups of lithologies (e.g., carbonate, siliciclastic)
parameters.lith_att_id: integer, ID of a lithology attribute from /defs/lithology_attributes
parameters.lith_att: string, specific lithology attribute name (e.g. fine, olivine, poorly washed)
parameters.lith_att_type: string, specific category of lithology attribute (e.g. grains, lithology, bedform)
parameters.econ_id: integer, ID of an economic attribute from /defs/econs
parameters.econ: string, name of an economic attribute
parameters.econ_type: string, name of an economic attribute type
parameters.econ_class: string, name of an economic attribute class
parameters.cltn_id: integer, one or more Paleobiology Database collection IDs
parameters.strat_name: a fuzzy stratigraphic name to match units to
parameters.strat_name_id: integer, a single or comma-separated list of stratigraphic IDs from /defs/strat_names
parameters.adjacents: boolean, if lat/lng or col_id is specified, optionally return all units in columns that touch the polygon containing the supplied lat/lng
parameters.response: Any available response_type. Default is short.

fields.col_group: text, name of group the column belongs to, generally corresponds to geologic provinces
fields.col_group_id: integer, the ID of the group to which the column belongs
fields.group_col_id: float, the original column ID assigned to the column (used in the original source)
fields.col_area: float, area in square kilometers of the Macrostrat column
fields.project_id: unique identifier for project, corresponds to general geographic region
fields.max_thick: number, maximum unit thickness in meters
fields.max_min_thick: integer, the maximum possible minimum thickness in meters
fields.min_min_thick: integer, the minimum possible minimum thickness in meters
fields.b_age: number, continuous time age model estimated for initiation, in Myr before present
fields.t_age: number, continuous time age model estimated for truncation, in Myr before present
fields.pbdb_collections: integer, count of PBDB collections in units/column
fields.econ: text, name of econonomic use, see defs/econs
